Html:
Hi Mark, et al.,
As always, thanks for your fine library and hard work.

Moving up to NAudio 1.7 now.

I include these 2 assemblies with my app but rebuild them because my app requires signed assemblies (which is easy enough).

NAudio.WindowsMediaFormat.dll
NAudio\NAudio.dll

QUESTION
Is there any problem with resetting the target .Net Framework to 4.0 Client Profile?

These two dlls build successfully with that framework level. Just wondering if there are any hidden runtime gotchas that I won't find out about til later.
I don't think that should be an issue, but I haven't actually tried it
Thanks for the quick reply Mark. I'll do some testing and report back on results (success or not).
Just to report back, these 2 dlls rebuilt to .Net 4.0 Client Profile work fine. If I hit any bugs later during testing, I'll let post back here. But so far so good.
